messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: OPERATION TAG: Delta-328 DATE: 04/10/41  An underground fight ring has been rumored to operate within the city, drawing attention from international betting syndicates. Young athletes are believed to be lured and exploited.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  OPERATION LEAD: Captain X. Y. Brewer is formulating a strategy to infiltrate and dismantle the operation. UNDERCOVER: Detectives Z. A. Montgomery and B. C. Tyson are being prepped to pose as interested bettors. INTELLIGENCE: Detectives D. E. Kelley and F. G. Dawson are tracking monetary flows, looking for patterns related to the betting. PATROL: Patrol Officers H. I. Lloyd, J. K. Flynn, and L. M. Mercer have been rerouted to monitor suspected venues for increased activity. OUTREACH: Lieutenant N. O. Zimmerman is working with local gyms and trainers, spreading awareness about the illegal ring and gathering tips. ADDITIONAL DETAILS:  There's an upcoming major event as per intercepted messages, expected to draw large amounts of money.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Context: These officers are monitoring locations believed to be hosting the fights.
